kvs.join-plan: Join for Rebates, Save on Fees
kvs.join-plan-des: You can join the SunPump rebate program through a FAIR DAO invitation. Get an 8% rebate on every transaction fee (only tokens with 100% launch progress qualify for commission). Commissions are settled bi-weekly. You need to sign the SunPump rebate contract. Join Rebate Program
kvs.buy-sale-des: Enter the SunPump FAIR token sales page to place orders. Buy or Sell Now
